title: Convert
description: Convert any part of your Bitcoin balance to another crypto whenever the need arises.

title: Send
description: Send any crypto to anyone, virtually anywhere in the world as an alternative to sending money.

title: Hold
description: You can store your Bitcoin and many other cryptocurrencies in your Coinsfish wallet.

title: Create Payouts
description: You can receive settlements quickly and conveniently via digital currencies.

title: Accept
description: Accept payments in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Bitcoin cash, Litecoin and more.
